page.title: 09WORLINGTON SCHOOL FACILITIES
page.content: We have 36 children divided into 2 classes. Mrs.Barnett and Mrs.Haughton are full time teachers and Mrs. Saltmarsh is a part time teacher.When a teacher goes to a meeting Mrs. Archibald takes the class.We start in Mrs.Haughton's class when we are 5 and move into Mrs.Barnett's when we are 7 or 8. When we are 11 we move to Chulmleigh School which is 6 miles away.School dinners come from Witheridge and are served by Andrew's gran. They cost 57p.9 children bring a packed lunch. Mrs.Sowden is our school secretary and Andrew's mum is our cleaner .We use one room in the school house for a T.V,video and music room and the other room is a library.The Playgroup meet there twice a week.We have a playground, small field and environmental area with a pond and tree bank.
